message: Hi Bob, thanks for your interest in my product.  I'm excited to discuss this opportunity with you.  To start the conversation, I'm proposing a price of $1,600,000. I believe this represents fair value considering the unique benefits it offers.

I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the market value and the benefits it offers.
